tuner:ATRelic.NAME: Destroyer
DESCRIPTIONS: 1.View top #b5 cards in your draw pile. They are considered as mission #yTargets . NL 2.After each victory in combat, there is a chance generate a #yEleph .

tuner:Bless.NAME: Friend's Gift
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your 2nd turn, add #yStabilize with the same count into your hand.

tuner:MemoryFragments.NAME: Prefect Team Armband
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn, until no [E] remaining at the end of one turn.

tuner:GehennaPrefectTeam.NAME: Prefect Team's Official Tube
tuner:GehennaPrefectTeam.FLAVOR: This special tube is made of top-of-the-line materials to ensure Hina's safety, who can't swim. You'll never see her in the water without it.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replace #yPrefect #yTeam #yArmband. NL Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
